None.Name: Rifle Attack
None.Description: Every 2 seconds, unit fires slugs at enemies that deal 16 damage.

None.Name: Dark Grenade
None.Description: Activate to charge a dark sphere that explodes after having been fed with 24 shots dealing 2400 damage to hostile and friendly entities in a 20m radius around its target, up to 3600 in total. Knocks back small and medium units. Reusable every 20 seconds.
